channel.title: I have many questions - Please Help me -
channel.description:
Hi, i have many questions here and really want someone to help...
1) How can i remove what npcs say ? 2) Npcs don't attack back ? how can i make them attack back ? 3) I have changed the Ip into my no-ip and i logged in client ( not submited to mopar ) and i closed it for a while and wanted to get back on...so when i put run client. does not work , write : exception in thread...etc and i have jre and jdk and set the path.. 4) How can i add Owner/Admin/Mod Capes ? 5) how can i make someone a member ? in character files....wat number should be in the player rights. 6) how can i set the drag stone ring which kills an npc with a hit ..? only for owners. 7) When i spawn a make-over mage , why can't i change the character's appearance?? 8) How can i make the game run without a client , ex: on moparscape webclient .?
[b]Thats All . I would really appreciate if you help me [/b]
and please when ur replying. put in the question number and answer. Thanks ! =)

item.title: I have many questions - Please Help me -
item.dc:creator: @dragdrag1 dragdrag1
item.source: I have many questions - Please Help me -

item.title: I have many questions - Please Help me -
item.dc:creator: @IceTICKER IceTICKER
item.description:
@IceTICKER wrote:

To Remove What The Npc Is Saying, Find The Npc That is talking.

Ex “Click Me To Buy Food”.

Search For Click Me To Buy Food In Your Source, And Remove it.

Read full topic
item.source: I have many questions - Please Help me -

item.title: I have many questions - Please Help me -
item.dc:creator: @dragdrag1 dragdrag1
item.description:
@dragdrag1 wrote:

Hi, i have many questions here and really want someone to help…

  1. How can i remove what npcs say ?
  2. Npcs don’t attack back ? how can i make them attack back ?
  3. I have changed the Ip into my no-ip and i logged in client ( not submited to mopar ) and i closed it for a while and wanted to get back on…so when i put run client. does not work , write : exception in thread…etc and i have jre and jdk and set the path…
  4. How can i add Owner/Admin/Mod Capes ?
  5. how can i make someone a member ? in character files…wat number should be in the player rights.
  6. how can i set the drag stone ring which kills an npc with a hit …? only for owners.
  7. When i spawn a make-over mage , why can’t i change the character’s appearance??
  8. How can i make the game run without a client , ex: on moparscape webclient .?

Thats All . I would really appreciate if you help me

and please when ur replying. put in the question number and answer.
Thanks ! =)

Read full topic
